description: Cowsay MCP Server, providing ASCII art cow capabilities for LLMs. This implementation allows language models to generate fun ASCII art cows with custom messages.

caseSensitive.description: Whether character matching should be case sensitive

capabilities.name: cowsay
capabilities.description: Generate ASCII art of a cow saying something.

capabilities.name: cowthink
capabilities.description: Generate ASCII art of a cow thinking something.

capabilities.name: get_version
capabilities.description: Get the current version of cowsay-mcp server.
